name: UViewportInteractor
doc: Represents the interactor in the world

methods.name: CanCarry
methods.doc: Gets if the interactor can carry an object

methods.name: GetDraggingMode
methods.doc: Gets the current interactor data dragging mode

methods.name: GetHitResultGizmoFilterMode
methods.doc: Gets current gizmo filter mode used for Interaction

methods.name: GetHoverLocation
methods.doc: Gets the interactor laser hover location

methods.name: GetLaserPointer
GetLastRoomSpaceTransform
methods.doc: Gets the last hand transform of the interactor, in the local tracking space

methods.name: GetLastTransform
methods.doc: Gets the last world transform of this interactor

methods.name: GetOtherInteractor
methods.doc: Gets the paired interactor assigned by the world interaction, can return null when there is no other interactor

methods.name: GetRoomSpaceTransform
methods.doc: Gets the hand transform of the interactor, in the local tracking space

methods.name: GetTransform
methods.doc: Gets the world transform of this interactor

methods.name: GetTransformAndForwardVector
GetWorldInteraction
methods.doc: Gets the world interaction

methods.name: HandleInputAxis_BP
methods.doc: To be overridden. Called by HandleInputAxis before delegates and default input implementation

methods.name: HandleInputKey_BP
methods.doc: To be overridden. Called by HandleInputKey before delegates and default input implementation

methods.name: IsHoveringOverGizmo
methods.doc: If the interactor laser is currently hovering over a gizmo handle

methods.name: SetCanCarry
methods.doc: Sets if the interactor can carry an object

methods.name: SetDraggingMode
methods.doc: Sets the current dragging mode for this interactor

methods.name: SetHitResultGizmoFilterMode
methods.doc: Sets the current gizmo filter mode used for Interaction

methods.name: Shutdown
methods.doc: Whenever the ViewportWorldInteraction is shut down, the interacts will shut down as well

methods.name: Tick
methods.doc: Update for this interactor called by the ViewportWorldInteraction
